DOC.detailed_description: Currently Merck manufacture HPV ( type 6 , 11 , 16 , 18 ) L1 virus like particle vaccine description report previously . ( 18 ) Merck supply vaccine , store directed manufacturer . The vaccine store Medstar Research Institute ( Women Infants Research Services ) It administer intramuscular injection ( 0.5 mL ) upper arm thigh research nurse ( Sarah Duwel , RN nurse work supervision ) transplant clinic . Participants give form fill regard allergic prior vaccination . After research nurse review form patient guardian , immunization blood collection perform . Participants receive full dose vaccine day 1 , month 2 ( ± 3 week ) , month 6 ( ± 3 week ) . All participant require afebrile ( oral temperature < 37.8° C ) within 24 hour injection . All female participant undergo urine pregnancy test vaccinate found pregnant . Female participant positive urine pregnancy test inform confidentially test result study nurse refer OB/GYN care . Serum sample obtain participant day 1 , month 3 , month 7 . Samples de-identified stored -20°C anti-HPV level determine use HPV type-specific competitive Luminex xMAP-based immunoassay ( cLIA ) . ( 18 ) Merck make arrangement labs test . This assay measure neutralize anti-HPV antibody , rather broad assortment vaccine-induced anti-HPV antibody . Antibody level express milliMerck unit ( mMU ) per milliliter . The low limit detection anti-HPV 6 , 11 , 16 , 18 cLIAs 4.1 mMU6/mL , 3.0 mMU11/mL , 10.2 mMU16/mL , 2.9 mMU18/mL , respectively . Assay precision estimate 21.7 % , 20.4 % , 23.0 % , 15.9 % anti-HPV 6 , 11 , 16 , 18 cLIAs respectively . Participants consider anti-HPV 6 , 11 , 16 , 18 seropositive anti-HPV antibody titer 20 mMU6/mL , 16 mMU11/mL , 20 mMU16/mL , 24 mMU18/mL , respectively . Blood collection supply obtain lab vendor Laprepco ( www.labrepco.com ) . The lab use process antibody titer PPD Labs ( www.ppdi.com ) .
